narrative.narrative: TransAVIAexport Airlines is a cargo airline based at Minsk,Belarus and Sharjah,United Arab Emirates. It started in 1992. It flies all over the world, spanning every continent, even the arctic. At 2012 it had six Il-76TD's. It has been said to even help nations come closer by creating links between them through cargo contracts, and has become known for being a reliable cargo hauler.
